title: A Shot in the Dark
description: The west was wilder than anyone thought.Killian McBride wanders the new American frontier, dispensing justice at the end of a sword. His reasons are his own, and even his best friend, Jesse, does not know just how dark Killian’s past really is.A split second decision to save damsel in distress, and Killian and Jesse wind up with much more than they bargained for. A crazy Russian sorcerer may hold the answers that Killian has sought for years, answers that will ultimately force him to make the most difficult decision of his life.The fate of Killian’s soul, his friends, and his country rests on the edge of a blade, and will be determined by a shot in the dark.
author: A.N. Drea
